ğ“ˆ™ ğ“†‘ ğ“ˆ™ ğ“†‘ ğ“‡‹ ğ“‡‹ ğ“ ğ“® ğ“„† | one greatly respected | servus Sebastian

Sebastian is not a figure mentioned in the Bible. The name is more commonly associated with Saint Sebastian, a Christian martyr who lived during the Roman Empire. He is venerated as a saint in the Catholic and Orthodox traditions, but his life and martyrdom are not found in biblical texts. Saint Sebastianâ€™s legend grew in later Christian hagiography, especially related to his depiction as being shot with arrows.
